issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: sleeper service fails to launch with "Authentication Required"

comments.body: - Fix Kerberos challenge from client side.

Bulk update: moved all 3.1.1 non-blocker issues, please move back if it is a blocker.

I have done some testing with patch 4 and it looks pretty good. It needs some dependency cleanup, because the services-api module has a lot of undeclared dependencies (only some of which are introduced by this patch). Also, I would suggest using javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders instead of the org.apache.http version, since we already have javax.ws.rs:jsr311-api as a dependency.
Attached patch 5 based on patch 4 plus dependency cleanup.
